entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is mentioned as being worried about Aragog.

entities.name: aragog

entities.name: professor grubbly-plank
entities.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank is a teacher who substituted for Hagrid a few times and was described as a dreadful teacher by Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is mentioned as being hungry and having abandoned his rock cake.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends and is mentioned as agreeing with Hermione that Professor Grubbly-Plank was a dreadful teacher.
